featured.text: Following increasing calls for the return of artistic objects that were removed decades or centuries ago, some of the world’s leading museums have signed a declaration that they will not hand back the ancient artifacts to their countries of origin.

definition.example: The 1990s was a decade known for its significant cultural changes.
